mapper.sql: id , org_id, username, password, nickname, phone, email, status, expired_time, icon_url, describe, is_deleted, revision, created_by, created_time, updated_by, update_time
mapper.select:
select distinct res.* from sys_resource res left join sys_role_resource rr on res.id = rr.resource_id left join sys_role r on r.id = rr.role_id left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id left join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id
res.is_deleted = 0
and u.id = #{userId}
order by resource_order
